DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Effect IV Doses Rivipansel Subjects With Renal Impairment Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Female subject nonchildbearing potential male subject Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 40.0 kg/m2 Stable renal function A positive urine drug screen illicit drug Treatment investigational drug within 30 day dose study medication Pregnant female , breastfeed female subject male subject partner currently pregnant Use herbal supplement 28 day prior dose study medication Blood donation ( exclude plasma donation ) approximately 1 pint within 56 day prior study medication Requiring dialysis
